item.title: [pi] sendoption issue
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

	public void handlegames(int gamesId) {
		c.getDH().sendOption4("Fight Pits", "Draynor", "Dagannoth Kings", "Al Kharid");
		c.usinggames = true;
	}
	public void handleGodneck(int GodneckId) {
		c.getDH().sendOption5("GWD", "Saradomin", "Zamorak", "Aramdyl", "Bandos" );
		c.usingGodneck = true;
	}
	public void handleGlory(int gloryId) {
		c.getDH().sendOption4("Edgeville", "Slayer Tower", "Barrows", "Mage Bank");
		c.usingGlory = true;
	}
	public void handleduelring(int duelringId) {
		c.getDH().sendOption2("Duel Arena", "Castle Wars");
		c.usingduelring = true;
	}

all is fine but duelring is not it says that it has private acces to npcdialouge for sendoption

Read full topic
